title: Online/Hybrid Science Project-Based Learning Preparation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: The need for elementary school teachers in service to strengthen foundational competencies for conducting science project-based learning in online/hybrid environments accessible via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners independently navigate scientific project materials using basic functions of an online learning platform.
Learners provide project feedback using smartphone-based collaboration tools with peer teachers in a hybrid classroom environment.
By week 4, learners complete a simple online educational module by applying ADDIE model-based science lesson design principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
